subcommands.name: submit
subcommands.description: Submit a level to be voted on.

subcommands.name: dm
subcommands.description: Toggle DMs when your levels are voted on

subcommands.name: check
subcommands.description: See the current vote of your level

name: List
description: Commands to manage levels on the list.

subcommands.name: place
subcommands.description: Place a level on the list

subcommands.name: edit
subcommands.description: Edit a level's info on the list

subcommands.name: move
subcommands.description: Move a level to a new position

subcommands.name: remove
subcommands.description: Remove/hide a level

subcommands.name: restore
subcommands.description: Restore a level to the list that was removed

subcommands.name: renameuser
subcommands.description: Rename a user on the site

name: Records
description: Commands to manage record on the list.

subcommands.name: add
subcommands.description: Add a record to a level

subcommands.name: addlast
subcommands.description: Adds a record, but reuses the details of the previous record

subcommands.name: edit
subcommands.description: Edit a record's info

subcommands.name: delete
subcommands.description: Delete a record

name: Packs
description: Commands to manage packs on the list (wip).

subcommands.name: create
subcommands.description: Add a pack to the list

subcommands.name: edit
subcommands.description: Edit a pack's info

subcommands.name: remove
subcommands.description: Delete a pack

subcommands.name: yes
subcommands.description: Add a yes vote to this level and pin the message

subcommands.name: no
subcommands.description: Add a no vote to this level and pin the message

subcommands.name: accept
subcommands.description: Accept this level (change the thread name, ping the submitter)

subcommands.name: reject
subcommands.description: Reject this level (change the thread name, lock the thread, ping the submitter)

subcommands.name: set
subcommands.description: Set a user's flag

subcommands.name: remove
subcommands.description: Remove a user's flag

name: votemod
description: Command to manage levels in voting. You probably don't need these

subcommands.name: set
subcommands.description: Update the bot's stored info of a level in voting

subcommands.name: insert
subcommands.description: Insert an existing submission into the bot's system

subcommands.name: ban
subcommands.description: Submission ban/unban a user
